opportunities.title: AHRQ Health Services Research Projects (R01)
opportunities.Synopsis: Supports health services research to improve quality, safety, equity, and value of healthcare.
opportunities.EligibleApplicants: Public and State controlled institutions of higher education; Private institutions of higher education

opportunities.title: NIH R21 Exploratory/Developmental Research Grant
opportunities.Synopsis: Exploratory/developmental research projects that break new ground or extend previous discoveries.
